channel.title: The Hungry Baby Blog
channel.description: Meal ideas for toddlers and beyond. Make mealtime fun with our easy, healthy and delicious recipes. Explore breakfast, lunch, dinner, snack or dessert ideas for your child. While a lot of the posts focus on Indian recipes for toddlers, you will also find a whole bunch of easy and fun meal ideas that you can try no matter where you are.

item.title: Rigatoni with Soya Ragu
item.description: This no-bake cookie is packed with nutty goodness and is nutritious and filling. Serve it with breakfast or as an evening snack or pack it for the snack break at school. The cookies are easy to make and store and are guaranteed to be a big hit!
